thread.title: Softing Inc. Features WireXpert® 4500 and NetXpertTM 1400 at BICSI Fall Conference and Exhibition Sep 20-24
thread.title_full: Softing Inc. Features WireXpert® 4500 and NetXpertTM 1400 at BICSI Fall Conference and Exhibition Sep 20-24

author: admin
title: Softing Inc. Features WireXpert® 4500 and NetXpertTM 1400 at BICSI Fall Conference and Exhibition Sep 20-24
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 10:31 AM   Softing 
KNOXVILLE, Tenn., Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Softing Inc., a leading industrial automation and electronics provider, is featuring the WireXpert Cable Certifier and the NetXpert LAN Qualifier at the 2015 BICSI Fall Conference and Exhibition being held at the Mandalay Bay Hotel & Convention Center in Las Vegas on September 20-24. ( http://www.bicsi.org/fall/2015/ ). 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150908/264326 
WireXpert Softing's WireXpert 4500 is the most advanced cable tester....operating up-to 2.5 GHz and designed to certify your data center and enterprise installations. With certification testing up-to Class FA and CAT8 copper cabling, as well as MPO, SM, MM and MMEF fiber optic cabling, WireXpert is ready for 40G and beyond. [Read more: http://softing.wirexpert.com/us ] 
In addition, WireXpert has been recently updated with Version 7.0 firmware including: -- Revised user interface -- Improved USB storage access. -- Date and time synchronization between Local and Remote -- Enhanced management of project / system settings -- Unlimited entry for sites and operators -- New software keyboard for data entry 
NetXpert Softing's NetXpert 1400 is a Gigabit LAN Qualifier and a Network Diagnostic Tool. It provides a complete solution for cable qualification and troubleshooting of active networks to support Gigabit Ethernet operation compliant with the IEEE 802.3ab standard. [Read more: http://softing.wirexpert.com/us/products/cabling-infrastructure/copper/qualifier.html ] 
Key capabilities include: -- Testing of network and coaxial cabling....many with simple Pass/Fail indication -- Measuring signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) -- Performing full TDR measurement -- Diagnosing opens, shorts, mis-wires, and split pairs via full-color wire map -- Testing to IEEE 802.3 compliance at transmission rates of up to 1Gbit/s (BERT) -- Determining delay skew -- Saving results in the tester, and direct printing of reports 
See also: http://bicsifall.vporoom.com/Softing 
About Softing As of January 1, 2015 Softing Inc. is the North American business unit of Softing AG. 
Softing AG is a leading global provider of products for Industrial Automation and for Automotive Electronics. For over 30 years, the core business of Softing Industrial Automation has been industrial data communication 
Softing acquired Psiber Data GmbH in January of 2014. Psiber's cable testing products will be rebranded as Softing and sold through Softing channels. To find out more our cable testing business, please visit itnetworks.softing.com
